Data model¶

This data model is under rapid development at the moment, and is not stable.

Resource¶

field name type
id ObjectID *
title string
description string
resource_type string [‘web’, ‘group’, ...]
uri string [web URI format]
locations list of Location
service_area list of Location
moderations list of Moderation
curations list of Curation
tags list of string
related_resources list of RelatedResource
item_metadata ItemMetadata

* BSON ObjectID Specification

? item_type organisation, class, one-off event, event scheduling

RelatedResource¶

field name type
source Resource
target Resource
rel_type string [‘provider’, ‘about’]
item_metadata ItemMetadata

Location¶

Revised to use Ordnance Survey data.

Current fields support post code- more fields to be added for higher level units.

field name type
os_id string
label string
place_name string
lat_lon list of float [float, float]
os_type string [postcode, ward, district, country]
parents list of Location

ref source + URI

Moderation¶

field name type
outcome string [‘OK’, ‘block’, ‘refer’]
note string
item_metadata ItemMetadata

Curation¶

field name type
outcome string [‘OK for my group’, ‘not for my group’]
tags list of string
rating [not used]
note string
data dict (dictionary with field names as keys) *
item_metadata ItemMetadata
  • This will be used to allow trusted accounts to add their own metadata using their own schema.

Data will be converted to required formats on client access (may be cached for performance)

ItemMetadata¶

To be updated with Dublin core.

field name type
last_modified datetime
author ObjectID
shelflife datetime
status string
note string

Account¶

See code in engine-groups app

field name type
title string
slug string
members list of Membership

Membership¶

field name type
account Account
role string
